title: Dream6.Start
body:
....
Emma? Is that you?
Is that really you!?
...
I'm sorry for running way
I'm sorry I left you, I've never forgiven myself
are you alive?
where are you?
...
can you speak?
can you even hear me?
...
If you're still alive, I'll find you
I'll set you free, I'll kill anyone who gets in my way
please tell me where you are
<<returnToCampScene DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
